backend/main.mo: Motoko canister with admin‑protected Meta API config, WhatsApp number status check via HTTP outcalls, user profile storage, and document/contact form data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing Page 3 redesign, SEO, CTA, and visual‑theme work mapped to affected files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all major frontend React files, pages, components, hooks, and assets.
frontend/.gitignore: Git ignore rules for node modules, builds, env files, IDE artifacts, Hostinger ZIP artifacts, and staging folders.
frontend/HOSTINGER_ZIP_README.md: Readme with instructions for building and deploying the frontend to Hostinger via ZIP.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH design tokens and light/dark theme variables.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entrypoint defining metadata, canonical URL, favicon, and loading the React app.
frontend/public/.htaccess: Apache rewrite rules enabling SPA routing, compression, caching, and disabling directory browsing.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and linking to sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing key site pages with lastmod, changefreq, and priority.
frontend/scripts/build-hostinger-zip.mjs: Node script that builds the frontend, injects .htaccess, and generates a Hostinger‑ready ZIP archive.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app's routing using TanStack Router, defines all page routes, and wraps the router with a theme provider.
frontend/src/components/chatbot/chatbotF: Defines chatbot intents, message types, quick replies, and a full conversation flow map for the chatbot.
frontend/src/components/chatbot/ChatbotW: Implements a floating chatbot widget with message flow, quick replies, and WhatsApp integration.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with brand info, contact details, and navigation links.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the site header with navigation, mobile menu, brand logo, and conditional admin links.
frontend/src/components/HostingerZipDown: Checks for availability of a Hostinger ZIP file and shows a download button or instructions if missing.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the page layout including header, footer, main content outlet, chatbot widget, and WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/components/SEO.tsx: Dynamically updates document metadata, canonical links, and structured data for SEO.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppFloating: Displays a floating button that opens a pre-filled WhatsApp message.
frontend/src/constants/brand.ts: Provides brand metadata including name and logo configuration.
frontend/src/constants/whatsapp.ts: Defines WhatsApp phone number and a helper to build WhatsApp message URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for submitting forms, uploading documents, checking admin access, and managing WhatsApp data.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission details, images, and SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard showing contact form submissions with search, CSV export, and authentication gating.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form with fields, submission handling, and success/error toasts using a custom mutation hook. Includes SEO metadata and a styled layout.
frontend/src/pages/DisclaimerPage.tsx: Displays the site's disclaimer with structured sections inside cards and an alert. Includes SEO and static informational content.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, highlights list, and navigation links for partner onboarding and support. Includes SEO and an illustration.
frontend/src/pages/InsuranceServicesPage: Shows a grid of insurance services with icons, titles, and descriptions. Includes SEO and a structured services layout.
frontend/src/pages/Page2Page.tsx: Provides motor insurance service details, business info, and a hero section with calls to action. Includes SEO and multiple feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/Page3Page.tsx: Shows health insurance services, benefits, and business info with a hero section and CTA buttons. Includes SEO and structured feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/Page4Page.tsx: Placeholder page with basic text inside a card and SEO metadata. Designed for future customizable content.
frontend/src/pages/Page5Page.tsx: Simple placeholder page with SEO metadata and a card describing customizable content.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerOnboardingPage: Implements partner onboarding with document requirements, drag-and-drop uploads, file management, and upload handling logic.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerSupportPage.ts: Displays partner support information, support service list, and links to contact and onboarding pages.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders a detailed privacy policy with multiple sections outlining data collection and usage.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows main, additional, and agent-specific services with icons, descriptions, and features.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfUsePage.tsx: Displays terms of use content with sections covering acceptance, licensing, and account rules.
frontend/src/pages/WhatsAppDashboardPage: React page handling WhatsApp messaging, admin settings, recipient management, and integration status using multiple custom hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session storage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, container settings, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking build progress, features, issues, and metadata for the Page 3 redesign initiative.
